entry.title: Set of 2 Horse Blanket Surcingle Repair for Blankets Hardware Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Blanket Accessories
Price: 5.99

Use this handy kit to repair your broken blanket straps. The surcingle replacement buckle and slider can replace the hardware on any belly surcingle straps. These can be used on any brand such as weatherbeeta, and weight blankets including lightweight and heavyweight. These are a great alternative to buying brand new blankets and turnouts. They are great for leg straps too!
  • QUANTITY- Sold in lot of 2 (3 pieces per lot)
  • SIZING- 2" Buckle and Sliders
  • USAGES - Great for belly surcingles on blankets

entry.title: Derby Originals Wind Storm 1200D All Season Waterproof Rain Horse Turnout Sheet with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 79.99 - 89.99 (19 variants)

Derby Originals’ latest line of ultra-premium winter blankets, the Windstorm Series, was designed to offer a myriad of blanket options in material, weight, and design for equines of all sizes. This comprehensive line features stable and turnout blankets and sheets available in a plethora of beautiful, modern colors in every size from 36” all the way up to rare 100” large draft horse sizing. These blankets are not only beautiful but designed to be hardy and long-lasting with even the most destructive horses.

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse sheet by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy sheet is made from durable and high quality materials.

THE PERFECT EVERYDAY SHEET - this versatile sheet was designed to work for a wide variety of horses and be the perfect every-day blanket for summer, autumn, winter, and spring weather and for use in both dry and wet conditions.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout sheet was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this sheet is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

DESIGNED FOR ALL-SEASON USE — this rain sheet was designed to protect your horse from the elements and is ideal for keeping your horse dry in wet or snowy weather, or using in cool weather for added warmth.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

 

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

 

Product Information:

  • Blanket Style: Turnout/Rain Sheet
  • Waterproof: Yes
  • Breathable: Yes
  • Weight: Light Weight
  • Material: 1200D Ripstop Nylon
  • Polyfil: 0g
  • Inner Lining: 210T Nylon

entry.title: Derby Originals Mesh Belly Band Reflective Trim Horse Fly Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Fly Sheets
Price: 52.99

Derby Originals’ premium mesh bellyband fly sheet was designed with your horse’s comfort and safety in mind. This fly sheet features a breathable mesh that helps keep your horse cool, as well as block harmful UV rays, and prevent biting insects from harming or irritating your horse. This fly sheet features new twists on the classic fly sheet design by adding back reflective strips to increase pasture visibility and safety and adding a full mesh belly band to keep insects away from your horse’s sensitive belly. The soft fleece wither relief also prevents your horse’s mane from being damaged. This blanket is fully adjustable and features adjustable chest closures, adjustable shoulder gussets, adjustable belly band straps, and adjustable crossed leg straps.

 

Features

    KEEPS PESTS AWAY - this fly sheet was designed to help protect your horse’s body, chest, and belly from biting insects and pests. Insects are unable to get through the mesh to bite at your horse, in turn preventing sores, irritation, and wounds from bug bites or reactions to them.

    COMFORTABLE FIT - our fly sheets have a soft fleece wither relief to prevent mane damage, soft trim covering the edges of the blanket, and are made with a mesh that won’t rub your horse’s fur or irritate their skin. The crossed leg straps are designed to prevent slippage or chafing.

    REFLECTIVE TRIM - the back corners of this fly sheet have strips of reflective material sewn onto them so that your horse will be visible from even great distances at night, making your horse more visible and safe at pasture, especially during times like hunting season!

    BREATHABLE DESIGN - this fly sheet is designed with a lightweight but strong mesh body that is breathable and helps keep your horse cool, while also keeping bugs away from them.

    ADJUSTABLE FIT - this fly sheet features adjustable shoulder gussets that allow your horse to move more freely, along with two adjustable chest straps and an adjustable belly band and leg straps in order to make sure your horse gets the best fit possible.

     

    Directions

    This product should be placed on your horse and used to keep biting insects and other pests away, protect your horse from harmful UV rays and help keep your horse cool. This fly sheet can be used in the barn or pasture.

entry.title: Derby Originals Comfy Stretch Lycra Sleazy Slicker Full Head and Body Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Lycra Sheets and Hoods
Price: 79.95 - 89.95 (26 variants)

Derby Originals Comfy Stretch Lycra Sleazy Slicker Full Head and Body Sheet is designed to be the ideal multi-purpose stretchable lycra spandex sheet. Whether you're looking to train your horse's mane, protect your horse's face and body from biting insects, prevent sun-bleaching, keep your horse clean before a show, prevent blanket chafing, rubbing, and fur loss, or simply keep your horse warm underneath their favorite blanket, our lycra slinkies can do it all! Our superior lycra is machine washable, resistant to rips, tears, and snags, and has a 4-way stretch for a superior fit and freedom of movement. Our full head and body sheet design features a no-rub fleece noseband, a neck zipper for easier on/off, a wide velcro belly band closure, and adjustable leg straps. This design also boasts extra-large eye and ear openings for an improved fit. We're also the only company to back our lycra with a full 6-month manufacturer's warranty that guarantees against manufacturing defects!


  • DESIGNED WITH COMFORT IN MIND - Derby originals lycra sleazys are designed to keep your horse comfortable and clean and are made from stretchable, breathable, non-rubbing, and moisture-wicking lycra that will polish and protect your horse's coat.
  • 4 WAY STRETCH DESIGN INCREASES COMFORT - all Derby Originals lycra is made from lycra spandex that can stretch in all 4 directions, making our slinkies, hoods, and shoulder guards perfectly form-fitting and extra comfortable for your horse to wear.
  • EFFECTIVELY TRAINS YOUR HORSE'S MANE - our lycra full body sheet with hood is great to use to train your horse's mane to lie flat and to one side. Our form-fitting, stretchy lycra design helps keep the hair in place while also polishing the fur coat.
  • KEEPS YOUR HORSE CLEAN AND FLY-FREE - Derby Originals lycra wear is designed to help your horse clean, comfortable, and fly-free. Our soft spandex lycra polishes the hair coat and keeps it free of dirt, hay, and debris while also preventing chafing.
  • COMES WITH A 6 MONTH WARRANTY - all Derby Originals lycra wear comes with a 6-month limited manufacturer's warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Visit Derby Originals' website to register your product and for more details.

entry.title: Derby Originals Waterproof Horse Tack Cover Show Sheet - Protects Your Tack from Rain & Snow at Shows
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Sheets
Price: 31.99

This rain cover is a must-have for every rider thanks to its wide range of uses and classic design. Whether you’re riding in rainy, wet, or misty conditions, looking to keep your horse or tack dry before a show, or want to be able to ride while keeping your expensive tack covered and protected from the sun, rain, mud, sand, or other dirt and debris in the ring or on a trail, this sheet can do it all!

NOT A TURNOUT SHEET - please be aware that this is not a turnout sheet or blanket, this is a lightweight cover designed to be used to keep your horse and tack dry at events/during rides. Do not leave this sheet on your horse while unattended.

PERFECT FOR RAINY WEATHER RIDES - our show rain cover is perfect for riding in the rain thanks to its waterproof, lightweight, and breathable design that will keep your horse and tack dry without overheating your horse.

KEEPS YOUR HORSE DRY - this rain sheet was designed to cover your horse’s entire body from neck to tail and keep them dry during rides or events such as shows. This rain sheet is ideal for use before shows, during trail rides, etc.

LIGHTWEIGHT, BREATHABLE DESIGN - this rain sheet is made from a thin, lightweight nylon material that is breathable to prevent overheating or excess sweating, and instead, keep your horse cool.

PROTECTS YOUR TACK - our waterproof tack cover was designed to fully cover your tack to prevent water damage to your expensive riding equipment. Our unique stirrup openings even allow you to ride while this cover is protecting your saddle!

Our superior lycra is machine washable, resistant to rips, tears, and snags, and has a 4-way stretch for a superior fit and freedom of movement.  Our body sheet design features an easy slip-on design with a wide velcro belly band closure that provides extra protection for this sensitive area as well as adjustable leg straps. Our lycra sleazies are also great for using to protect wounds or sores on the body and will help to prevent irritation and fly strike. We're also the only company to back our lycra with a full 6-month manufacturer's warranty that guarantees against manufacturing defects!


  • DESIGNED WITH COMFORT IN MIND - Derby originals lycra sleazys are designed to keep your horse comfortable and clean and are made from stretchable, breathable, non-rubbing, and moisture-wicking lycra that will polish and protect your horse's coat.
  • 4 WAY STRETCH DESIGN INCREASES COMFORT - all Derby Originals lycra is made from lycra spandex that can stretch in all 4 directions, making our slinkies, hoods, and shoulder guards perfectly form-fitting and extra comfortable for your horse to wear.
  • EFFECTIVELY STOPS BLANKET CHAFING - many horses suffer from chafing and fur loss on their chest, back, and rear due to wearing blankets. Our lycra sleazys are designed to prevent rubbing, chafing, and irritation and help restore the fur coat.
  • KEEPS YOUR HORSE CLEAN AND FLY-FREE - Derby Originals lycra wear is designed to help your horse clean, comfortable, and fly-free. Our soft spandex lycra polishes the hair coat and keeps it free of dirt, hay, and debris while also preventing chafing.
  • COMES WITH A 6 MONTH WARRANTY - all Derby Originals lycra wear comes with a 6-month limited manufacturer's warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Visit Derby Originals' website to register your product and for more details.

Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Sheets
Price: 51.99

Quality Rain Sheet with no back seam. Waterproof and breathable this sheet is great alone or under a blanket for extreme warmth. Guaranteed to provide light-weight protection and comfort. These sheets are about 1" bigger than size to take care of shrink after first wash.
  • 600D Ripstop, waterproof, breathable outer shell with no back seam
  • Adjustable low cross surcingles. Double front buckle closures

entry.title: Derby Originals Classic Woven Cotton Hunter Beige Plaid Horse Summer Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Sheets
Price: 39.99

Our Classic Lightweight Hunter Beige Plaid Horse Summer Sheet is a must have for every horse owner: whether you need a lightweight layer to help dry your horse after a bath or keep them clean before a show, are looking for a cover to keep flies away from your horse in the summer, or are looking for a cozy, soft underlayment to keep your horse warm and prevent blanket irritation during the winter, our fleece sheet is perfect! These cotton sheets are even perfect for other equines such as mules and donkeys!

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - this summer sheet was designed to be comfortable to wear long-term and is designed to keep your horse warm in cool weather without overheating.
  • HELPS KEEP YOUR HORSE CLEAN - this sheet is lightweight and excellent to use in any season to keep your horse clean before a show or event, or use to help dry your horse and keep them comfortable after a bath.
  • PROTECTS AGAINST PESTS - this sheet is great for use as a flu sheet as it helps to keep your horse’s body protected from biting pests such as mosquitoes, flies, and gnats that would otherwise cause sores and irritation.
  • CLASSICAL DESIGN WITH PREMIUM FEATURES - this summer sheet features classic designs with a shoulder gusset, front chest buckles, crossed belly surcingles, removable elastic leg straps, and a fleece wither protector.
  • GREAT AS A BLANKET UNDERLAYMENT - this sheet is excellent for use during cold weather as an extra layer beneath blankets to help keep your horse warm inside the barn, or in the pasture on chilly days.

Sizing Information:

This sheet is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horse’s chest, to the end of your horse’s rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

Blanket Care:

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

Product Information

Blanket Style: Summer Sheet

Waterproof: No

Breathable: Yes

Weight: Lightweight

Material: Cotton

Denier: n/a

Ripstop: No

Tail Cover: No

Wither Protector: Yes

Shoulder Gussets: Yes

Polyfil: 0g

Inner Lining: Cotton

Belly Closure: Belly Surgincle

Leg Straps: Removable Elastic

Colors Available: Hunter Green/Beige Plaid

Sizes Available: 72”, 74”, 76”, 78”, 80”, 82”, and 84”
